Syntax
public class PropertyValues : UvendiaRepository<PropertyValue>, IBaseRepository<PropertyValue>

Methods

All(String, String, Int32, Object)

Returns all the property-values filtered by a SQL where clause. These query aliases you can use in your 'where' clause: [PropertyValue] PropertyValue [Property] Property [Definition] Definition

eq. where [PropertyValue].[Section] = 'Store'
